overview: This wonderful video tribute documents the amazing musical career of ABBA, with rare TV appearances, the hit singles and lesser known tracks from their early solo days. Plus exclusive in-depth interviews with: Stig Anderson (Manager), Owe Sandström (Costume Designer), Michael B. Tretow (Sound Engineer), Rune Söderqvist (Art Director) and many loyal ABBA fans around the world.
tagline: 'Thank You ABBA' is the video tribute to ABBA!
title: Thank You ABBA
